milestones.description: Begin with understanding the basics of deep learning, including neural networks and their architecture.
milestones.title: Introduction to Deep Learning

milestones.description: Review essential mathematical concepts such as linear algebra, calculus, and probability that are fundamental to deep learning.
milestones.title: Mathematics for Deep Learning

milestones.description: Familiarize yourself with popular deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.
milestones.title: Deep Learning Frameworks

milestones.description: Implement a simple neural network from scratch using a chosen framework.
milestones.title: Building Your First Neural Network

milestones.description: Learn about CNNs and their applications in image processing.
milestones.title: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)

milestones.description: Study RNNs and their use in sequence prediction tasks.
milestones.title: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)

milestones.description: Explore the concept of transfer learning and how to apply pre-trained models.
milestones.title: Transfer Learning

milestones.description: Learn techniques for tuning hyperparameters to improve model performance.
milestones.title: Hyperparameter Tuning

milestones.description: Understand different evaluation metrics and how to assess model performance.
milestones.title: Model Evaluation and Metrics

milestones.description: Learn about data preprocessing techniques and their importance in deep learning.
milestones.title: Data Preprocessing

milestones.description: Plan your hackathon project, including defining objectives and required datasets.
milestones.title: Project Planning

milestones.description: Collect and prepare the dataset needed for your hackathon project.
milestones.title: Dataset Collection and Preparation

milestones.description: Start developing your deep learning model based on the project plan.
milestones.title: Model Development

milestones.description: Train your model and monitor its performance.
milestones.title: Model Training

milestones.description: Test your model and validate its performance using the test dataset.
milestones.title: Model Testing and Validation

milestones.description: Make any final adjustments to the model and prepare for the hackathon.
milestones.title: Final Adjustments

milestones.description: Prepare your presentation and demo for the hackathon.
milestones.title: Hackathon Preparation

milestones.description: Participate in the hackathon and present your project.
milestones.title: Hackathon Day
